ygData.subject: Sorry, I'll be staying in CT
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry, but I think I ll be better of staying in CT. It s pointless for me to play in Innoruk, considering the fact that most of you people there are in their
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry, but I think I'll be better of staying in CT. It's pointless for me to
play in Innoruk, considering the fact that most of you people there are in
their mid-30s. My lowly Rogue will take too long a time to even catch up
with all of you, if ever. So I have decided to stay in CT. Good luck in
Innoruk.

Vectors - Level 9 Gnome Rogue in Innoruk
Veteran - Level 19 Halfling Druid in Cazic Thule
Lugger - Level 21 Gnome Mage in Cazic Thule
Scorpius - Level 9 Gnome Rogue in Cazic Thule

If you ever come to CT drop me a msg

PS. I love playing shorty races :)
